context: I failed to repay money I borrowed from you
letters:
Hey [Friend's Name],

I hope you’re doing well! I wanted to take a moment to reach out and apologize for not paying you back yet. I genuinely feel bad for putting you in that situation, and I totally understand if you're feeling frustrated.

Life got a bit hectic on my end, and I appreciate your patience more than I can say. I know it’s important to honor these things, and I promise I'm working on getting it sorted out as soon as possible. 

Thanks for being such a great friend, and I really appreciate your understanding. Let’s catch up soon—I owe you one!

Take care,
[Your Name]

Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to sincerely apologize for not repaying the money I borrowed from you as promised. I understand that this has put you in an uncomfortable position, and I’m truly sorry for any distress this may have caused.

Life has presented me with some unexpected challenges, and while that is no excuse, I want you to know that I take this matter seriously. Your support during that time was invaluable, and I deeply regret not honoring my commitment to you.

I am actively working on my finances to resolve this situation, and I want to assure you that I will repay you as soon as possible. I appreciate your understanding and patience in this matter.

Thank you for being such a great friend. I value our relationship deeply and am committed to making things right between us.

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]

Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I want to take a moment to sincerely apologize for not repaying the money I borrowed from you. I understand how important it is to honor our commitments, and I feel terrible for letting you down.

I appreciate your willingness to help me during a difficult time, and I regret that I didn’t follow through on my promise to repay you as planned. It was never my intention to disrespect your generosity, and I take full responsibility for the delay.

Please know that I am making it a priority to resolve this as soon as possible. I value our friendship deeply and can only hope that we can move past this misunderstanding. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

I am truly sorry for any frustration I may have caused, and I look forward to making things right between us.

Warm regards,  
[Your Name]
